name: BOSS FIGHTERS Token
description: BOSS FIGHTERS is a free-to-play online multiplayer action game that features asymmetrical combat where one player assumes the role of a powerful Boss, optionally using a VR headset, while others team up as agile Fighters. The game integrates Web3 elements, allowing players to earn, craft, and trade in-game items as NFTs through the marketplace. A dual-economy model supports both traditional and blockchain-enabled gameplay.
